experience.title: Product Analysis Engineer
description: Working in the Heart Failure division of Abbott.
Collaborating with other engineers in the Mechanical Circulatory Support (MCS) Product Performance Group (PPG).
Directly involved in regulatory compliance of post-market performance of the HeartMate 3™ Left Ventricular Assist Device (LVAD).

experience.title: Associate Producer
description: Elevate every consumer touch point experience and effectively plan and project manage experiential and event marketing.
Evaluating project details, cost/budget, and timelines to make appropriate recommendations.
Prepare contracts, review vendor proposals, and negotiate contracts/costs.
Conduct pre- and post-project activities such as cost analysis and project recap.

experience.title: Biomedical Senior Project Engineer
description: Involved in the UT Design Studio developing the Coupage Technique for a medical device.
Tasked with automating the technique and creating a controllable vest.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate electronic systems into the device.

experience.title: Research Engineer
description: Research areas included in vitro co-culture and migration assays.
Conducted experiments regarding integrity and corrosion of Titanium implants.

experience.title: Market Success Coordinator
description: Assisted with incoming and outbound calls and handled logistical support.
Provided two-way communications while monitoring the grid to maximize performance.

experience.title: Luxury Delivery Concierge
description: Delivered for Louis Vuitton with a white-glove styled concierge service.

experience.title: Healthcare Manager
description: Managed teams for telehealth consultations and screened patients.
